Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1D WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1D ( FORMATOD1DCODI, PROYCODI, TIPO, DATACATCODI, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1DCODI, :PROYCODI, :TIPO, :DATACATCODI, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1D SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, TIPO = :TIPO, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1DCODI = :FORMATOD1DCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1D ORDER BY FORMATOD1DCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1D SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1D WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
